name: Last Man Standing (itch) (devshe289)
description:
In the year 3050, cat-like aliens, Xengrods, invaded Earth and spread a disease in their path. This disease caused humans to become infected and turn into Zombies. Now there are only a few survivors left, and it is up to them to save mankind. They must complete tasks to access strange ingredients to create The Draught of Blinding Light, or the ultimate cure, for this virus. However, on their journey, they must be careful to not become infected themselves and die.

Made in Twine 1.4.2 for COSMOS UCSC Cluster 5
